memberdef.name: ls

detaileddescription.para:
List all files and directories in a path. Directories end with '/' in the entry
If name_include or name_exclude is detected for a directory, all the elements in this directory are either included or excluded, respectively.
std::string
Only list files or directories which include this string in the name.
std::string
Exclude files or directories with this string in the name
std::vector<std::string>
Reference to a vector where the directories are added
bool
Check directory recursively
bool
Also list hidden files
std::vector<std::string>
Mike
